lines.text:
[after catching her brother spying on her]
I'm your fucking sister.
Yeah, you've got fucking big tits and I'm going to tell everybody I saw them.
No, Willy, Gramps is a Nazi.
What? No. Grandfather's in the study. Dad is dead.
Your grandfather is your grandfather AND your father!
I need to know the connection between the elves and the nazis!
Yeah, well, I had a rough day at work... Santa got murdered.
My cat is the only friend I have left.
